entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • User facing messages/warnings/errors should be localized, and documented #79173
    8.0.0
  • Deadlock with ClientWebsocket and lock blocks/Lazy objects #79171
  • JIT.Regression\JitBlue\Runtime_31615\Runtime_31615\Runtime_31615 fails #79170
    8.0.0
  • nativeAOT whether to support winform or wpf programs? #79166
  • Developers should not encounter property visibility issues when using STJ source generation #79161
    8.0.0
  • SYSLIB1054 code fixer should not generate a code that try to access to LibraryImport.ThrowOnUnmappableChar #79159
  • Unhandled exception on Linux ignores Dispose #79155
  • .NET runtime (on Linux) crashes with SIGABRT when using OpenSSL 3 with deprecated APIs disabled #79153
  • [.NET 7.0 + WASM AOT] App crash after update #79152
    7.0.x
  • Extra call in AppContext.BaseDirectory #79150
  • [API Proposal]: Add TotalPhysicalMemory and TotalVirtualMemory properties to the Environment class #79146
  • Is it expected that the host.native subset fails on a fresh build (when the single file host isn't yet built)? #79144
  • [AndroidCrypto] Any TargetHost input is set as SNI hostname #79143
  • Base constructor not executed in Reflection.Emit #79142
  • Test failure JIT\\Performance\\CodeQuality\\Serialization\\Serialize\\Serialize.cmd #79132
    8.0.0
  • Inliner: don't inline callees with pinvokes inside EH #79125
    Future

Closed

  • Redundant length check when using Span<byte> => new byte[] #12571
    8.0.0
  • Vector128.Min<int> produces sub-optimal code on x64 #75892
    8.0.0
  • WebAssembly.Sdk - Unsuppressable warnings #78690
    8.0.0
  • Testing System.DateTime area label #79167
  • [API Proposal]: Make FormattedLogValues class public #79149
  • Inconsistent ISO 8601 parsing between `DateTime` and `DateTimeOffset` #79131
  • System.IO.Pipes.Tests.NamedPipeTest_CurrentUserOnly_Windows.Connection_UnderDifferentUsers_BehavesAsExpected test failure #79052
    8.0.0
  • Null ignoring at SelectElements from System.Text.Json at JsonDocumentPathExtensions #78963
  • CS8631 in System.Text.Json source generated code #78903
  • System.Text.Json.JsonSerializer.Serialize does not correctly serialize classes that inherit from List<T> #79106
  • System.Text.Json constructor deserializing with covariant return type read-only properties sets values to null #56999
    Future
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 4 Regressions on 9/27/2022 4:04:11 PM #78805
  • Query: How does using System.Text.Json.Serialization.Metadata.JsonDerivedType attribute prevent any possibility of remote code execution? #79154
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_76194/Runtime_76194/Runtime_76194.sh #79130
  • Different code execution on Mac/Windows #79139
  • .NET 6: X509Certificate2.CreateFromPemFile does not work on linux(centos 7) #79141
  • [API Proposal]: XxHash128 #77885
    8.0.0
  • Consider expanding number formatting cache to larger values #76888
    8.0.0
  • publish use runtime quickly,publish use sele-container run cost treble time #79079

PullRequests

Created

  • Delete host test targeting old xunit packages #79177
    area-Host
  • Speeds up linker tests in NativeAOT #79176
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0][wasm] Correctly escape library names when generating symbols for .c #79175
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Map correct fmt for mov instruction #79174
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Speed up `Matrix4x4.CreateScale` #79172
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • Documentation signature parser tests and fixes for NativeAOT #79168
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Add stobj version for no reference case #79165
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix a build error on x86 with FEATURE_AUTO_TRACE turned on #79164
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix a NonBacktracking subsumption checking rule for XY|X??Y #79163
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [JIT] Allow new temp assignment whose dstTyp is TYP_I_IMPL and valTyp is TYP_BYREF #79162
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][tests] Using a literal field with stdsfld/ldsfld should trigger a MissingFieldException #79160
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [Draft] Fix spurious OOMs #79158
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Update new ArgumentOutOfRangeException.Throw methods to include ActualValue #79157
  • Disable struct promotion for structs with SIMD12 fields #79151
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Supply `-s INITIAL_MEMORY` to emcc in wasm.proj #79148
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Make .NET Framework and .NET Standard facade changes trackable #79147
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Re-Enable SendRecvPollSync_TcpListener_Socket Test #79145
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Delete .NET Native leftovers from type loader (part 4 of X) #79138
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix perf. regression caused by signed/unsigned comp #79137
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Fix typos #79136
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Copy local intellisense xmls for assemblies with source of truth. #79134
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • add SEC_E_CONTEXT_EXPIRED to avoid throwing InternalException #79129
    area-System.Net.Security, os-windows, 8.0.0
  • fix SslStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated with cached credentials #79128
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Improve CI triggers to work better #79127
    area-Infrastructure
  • [JIT] X64 - Allow containment of larger memory operands for `AND`, `OR`, `XOR` #79126
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Use ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull and ObjectDisposedException.ThrowIf in more places #79096
    area-Meta
  • [wasm] Add warning code to all warnings produced in WasmAppBuilder #78755
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix NonCryptoHashTestDriver.AssertEqualHashNumber for big endian #79135
    area-System.IO
  • Add XxHash128 #77944
    community-contribution, area-System.IO.Hashing
  • Enable loading COM component in default ALC via runtime config setting #79026
    area-Host
  • fixes dotnet-diagnostictests funceval failures #79123
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Wait for serverTask before asserting IsCompletedSuccessfully #79071
    area-System.IO
  • Remove staged build param #79119
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2058841 #78677
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [mono][interp] Fix PROFILE_INTERP option #79104
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Wasm jiterpreter cleanup and bug fixes pt. 3 #78782
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Remove FILEDosToUnixPathA conversion #78995
    breaking-change, area-PAL-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • Delete .NET Native leftovers from type loader (part 3 of X) #79133
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fix debugger tests run on CI/Windows #79124
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Use the new DateTimeOffset.TotalOffsetMinutes API #79107
    area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Increase size of Number's small numbers cache, and make it lazy #79061
  • Simplify Task.FromResult #79091
    area-System.Threading.Tasks

Updated

  • Experiment with changing the implementation strategy for RangeListMap #79021
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Use DOTNET_EnableCrashReport to create dumps #77578
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement unmanaged-to-managed direction for vtable stub generator #77130
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Remaining feedback part1 #79011
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Update assembly version from hardcoded to MajorVersion #78354
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] Add new `runtime-wasm-features` pipeline #76822
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Remove getFieldAddress #79060
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] - Fixed sub-optimal optimization for `a % 1` to Zero #77760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] X64/ARM64 - `CAST` removals for small types on `ADD`, `SUB`, `MUL`, `AND`, `OR`, `XOR`, `NOT`, `NEG` #77874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement a heuristic for using fast-path serialization in streaming JsonSerializer methods. #78646
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Add mechanism for runtime to query host for information #78798
    area-Host
  • Fix creating incorrect options in the repro package #79095
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • EventListener: Add test for logging a null string in an EventSource #77172
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • Remove mono specific SpanHelpers #78015
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Rewrite Enum and add {ISpanFormattable}.TryFormat #78580
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • CoreCLR initialization failures logging #78790
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • SP800-108 CTR HMAC #79120
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Exclude things which broken on Loongarch #78850
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Unify BufferedFileStreamStrategy seeking #78984
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [Android] Improvements to remote certificate verification in SslStream #77386
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android, 8.0.0
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in the RegexCompiler and source gen #78927
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • Add MemoryExtensions.Split #79048
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Memory model document. #75790
    documentation, area-Meta, needs-author-action, memory model
  • Support JsonExtensionData in src-gen fast-path #77880
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Add Utf8JsonWriter.WriteRawValue(System.Buffers.ReadOnlySequence). #76444
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Net 7 -c# 11 Interpolated Strings Object reference not set exception #29373
  • ClickOnce Publish fails if two referenced projects have the same file, despite being Excluded from the publish #29368
  • Latest "dotnet watch" returns an error on Ubuntu 22.04 #29352

Closed

  • CPPCLI package reference support doesn't enable packagedownload without an additional reference #29370
  • [GenAPI] Support the msbuild task to run on .NET Framework #29359
    8.0.1xx
  • Don't reference Microsoft.Windows.SDK.NET.Ref for C++/CLI projects #26203

PullRequests

Created

  • Pull razor dependencies from consolidate repo #29374
    Area-CodeFlow
  • Remove unnecessary sources from the test used nuget.config file to reduce 429s #29372
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove unnecessary sources from the test used nuget.config file to reduce 429s #29371
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Change the cppcli tests to use the package reference support #29369
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add version output option for dotnet list package command #29367
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add support for default values of methods parameters in the GenAPI. #29356
    Area-GenAPI
  • extend typo correction functionality with StartsWith and Contains #29350
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Multi target GenAPI for .NET Framework #29364
    Area-GenAPI
  • Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29158
  • Update razor-compiler dependencies #29322
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #29018
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Respect EnableRuntimePackDownload switch for AOT and R2R #29354
    Area-ReadyToRun

Updated

  • Add optional logging to MSBuild SDK Resolver #26904
  • Don't Infer RID outside of dotnet publish for PublishSingleFile/PublishAot #29031
    area-runtime, Document for breaking changes, Area-CLI, Area-SingleFile, Area-NativeAOT
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #29341
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-02
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Introducing a suffix for 'byte' literals #6775

Updated

  • generic constraint: where T : ref struct #1148
    Working Set
  • Add a way to inherit documentation <inheritdoc /> #313
    Backlog
  • Syntax to choose CurrentCulture/InvariantCulture for interpolated strings #3044

PullRequests

Merged

  • Adjust grammar specification for Primary Constructors. #6772

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: `IAttributeOperation.AttributedSymbol` #65735
  • While "Rename symbol’s file" is enabled, renaming class fails when using `TargetFrameworks` with at least two target frameworks #65731
  • Decimal default parameter value is not propagated to the synthesized delegate #65728
  • add "inline method" refactoring for async methods in C# #65721
  • Document outline should do shorter qualification for explicit interface methods #65714
  • Document outline should distinguish members with multiple overloads #65713

Closed

  • Inline diagnostics in the editor do not get cleared up #65503
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33201.295 #65718

PullRequests

Created

  • Move classification tests to new framework #65734
    Area-IDE
  • Results of running new "use nameof for nullable attributes" analyzer/fixer on roslyn #65733
    Area-IDE
  • Fix potential race where we're expecting a moniker to be attached #65732
    Area-IDE
  • Create DkmCustomUIVisualizerInfo instances with ExtensionPartId field #65730
    Area-Interactive, Community
  • Add fixer to offer to use `nameof(parameter)` in attributes now that the language allows that. #65729
    Area-IDE
  • Fix stale inline diagnostics (#65571) #65727
    Area-IDE
  • Unskip quick info tests #65725
    Area-IDE
  • Move to more consistent patterns in the parser. #65724
    Area-Compilers
  • Cleanup unused generated code #65723
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Implement parsing changes for Primary Constructors feature #65720
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • WIP: Always cache our lazy values. #65719
    Area-IDE
  • Simplify WeaklyCachedRecoverableValueSource #65717
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Move CSharpTyping test to new framework #65726
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65711
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Introduce simpler pattern for managing reset points in the parser. #65702
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • editorconfig UI accessibility bugs #65712
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Delete unnecessary code that was for recoverable trees #65716
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove unused constructor #65715
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix stale inline diagnostics #65571
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Turn on NRT for the parser. #65706
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Switch to having the IFileChangeWatcher return IDisposable tokens #65709
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Switch from HostWorkspaceServices to SolutionServices #65705
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Move to using ToListAndFree in more places in the parser. #65708
    Area-Compilers
  • Move IDS_FeatureRefLocalsReturns out of the parser #65710
    Area-Compilers
  • Implement a new brokered service for passing project information #65592
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #65699
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Remove Duplicate Custom UI Visualizer Attributes from CLR Types #57828
    Area-Compilers
  • Produce binding errors for incomplete members #62874
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • log data for analyzers/codefixes/refactorings #65158
    Area-IDE
  • Use RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan for array initialization with relevant primitives #61414
    Area-Compilers
  • Revert "Disable flakey integration tests" #62542
    Area-IDE
  • Display standalone parameter names by default #65606
    Area-Compilers
  • Ensure proper receiver value is used for a constrained call invocation #65642
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix wrong symbol comparisons #65430
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Allow optional and `params` parameters in synthesized delegate templates #65582
    Area-Compilers
  • Consider delegate default parameter values and `params` in symbol matcher #65579
    Area-Compilers
  • Update CSharpErrorFactsGenerator to be a source generator #65192
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Avoid reporting ref safety errors for discard assignments #65693
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: json_actix #45429
  • Blazor Webassembly standalone deployments #45428
  • Referenced Razor Class Library Component Reporting Error RZ10012 #45427
  • StreamReader.ReadLineAsync() does not return before its internal buffer is full #45425
  • `Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.StackExchangeRedis` not working with IPv6 because using an old version of `StackExchange.Redis` #45424
  • Support for Blazor Custom elements to handle nesting of components. #45421
  • InputNumber validation not working as expected #45420
  • Blazor Authentication (Hosted Web Assembly) via External Social Login Providers doesn't redirect to server endpoint on callback url to complete authentication state in deployed environment (Azure App Service) #45419
  • Blazor error on load `ReferenceError: history is not defined` #45418
  • Dotnet 7 Javascript API : pass ElementReference as parameter #45416
  • CascadingTypeParameter not working as expected #45415
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, json_actix, plaintext_nodejs #45414

Closed

  • Weird Blazor WASM bug: Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.Rendering.WebAssemblyRenderer[100] Unhandled exception rendering component: Arg_IndexOutOfRangeException #44542
    8.0-preview1
  • Azure AD authentication fails in a brand new template with correct settings. #45422

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix typos in `docs/EventSourceAndCounters.md` #45430
    community-contribution
  • Use built in methods #45426
    Perf
  • Introduce non-virtual RegisterTokenProviderCore method. #45413
    area-identity

Merged

  • [feature/green-threads] Update dependencies #45423
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • Warn the user if they're specifying protocols that won't be used #45352
    area-runtime
  • Support STJ Polymorphism #45405
  • Fix Http3ConnectionEmptyBenchmark #45406
    area-runtime
  • Add DateOnly and TimeOnly to MVC Model Binding #45243
    blocked, area-web-frameworks
  • [release/7.0] gRPC JSON transcoding: Support deserializing non-nested enum from string #45411
    Servicing-consider, area-grpc, 7.0.3
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2059075 #44686
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Use non-localized 7.0.x links in installer #45410
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, feature-installers, feature-localization
  • [release/6.0] Use non-localized 6.0.x links in installer #45403
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, feature-installers, feature-localization, 6.0.x
  • [release/2.1] Use non-localized 2.1.x links in installer #45409
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, feature-installers, feature-localization, 2.1.x
  • Do not generate Content for request parameters in OpenAPI #45404
    area-web-frameworks
  • Add support for JSON output to more commands #45383
    area-commandlinetools
  • Code analyzer to detect if route parameters are parsable #45286
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-02
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • dbgshim fails to decode libcoreclr.so headers from Snap install #3510
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Update docker images to latest tags #3535

Merged

  • Merge main into release/stable #3534

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Proposal] Remove net7.0 from maui class library template or provide better support for net7.0 inside our single project targets #11839
  • MAUI 7.0 iOS Release build won't install on iOS 16 #11838
  • Android "No compatible code running on the thread" and crash after hit continue #11837
  • Navigation to ContentView results in NullReferenceException #11836
  • BlazorWebView error when doing XAML Hot Reload #11835
  • x:Static in conjunction with XamlCompilation results in XFC0101 compile time error. #11833
  • Text doesn't scale when accessibility size is changed #11832
  • ListView with observable collection as item source is crashing app when not debugging #11831
  • MAUI app crash with .net7 #11830
  • Android ToolbarItem shows incorrect icon on Navigation subpage #11829
  • .NET 7 Android - signal 11 (SIGSEGV), code 1 (SEGV_MAPERR) - (.NET ThreadPool) #11828
  • [Scenario Days 02 Dec] Local images not loading #11827
  • Domain Architecture causing build to fail Windows is fine Andriod fails #11825
  • File | New | Maui app always picks .NET 6 the first time #11824
  • [Scenario Days 02 Dec] Crash trying to use SearchHandler #11823
  • [Scenario Days 02 Dec] Image not rendering in Shell Flyout Header #11822
  • [Scenario Days 02 Dec] Wrong ToolbarItem color and size #11821
  • [Scenario Days 02 Dec] Crash navigating between Shell tabs #11820
  • RadioButton ControlTemplate and Style issues #11819
  • [Scenario Days 02 Dec] Wrong positions translating CarouselView children views #11818
  • Label control with TextType set to Html not able to change FontSize #11817
  • Removing platforms from the Maui project file breaks the publish menu option #11816
  • editor Small problem #11815
  • Winform Blazor Support JavaScript #11814
  • Setting Content of `ContentView` through style would crash on parent change #11812

Closed

  • Mac Button Issue #11834
  • [Maui Blazor] App becomes unresponsive when dragging and dropping text outside the window. #7390
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Flyout menus don't work; CollectionView lists don't work; ListView lists don't work; Frames don't work... #8602
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [Spec] Publishing MAUI apps should be consistent across platforms from the command line for CI/CD #3283

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Xamarin.UITest from 4.0.0 to 4.0.1 #11826
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • Update templates to have separate default for framework selection #11034
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/templates 📄

Updated

  • Only add PointerGesture if PointerOver VisualState exists #11591
    area/gestures
  • [net7.0] Update PublicAPI.Shipped.txt files #11759
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [main] Update PublicAPI.Shipped.txt files #11760
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Make MAUI into 1 workload and lots of NuGets instead of a full workload #11206
    area/setup 🪄
  • [Android] Clear before each Image Source change #11787
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-image
  • [Android] Setup `Frame` with all of the missing `Mapper` methods #11804
    area/controls 🎮
  • Make inline video / picture in picture enabled by default on WebView for iOS #11075
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [windows] ReadyToRun packages ahead of time #11744
    platform/windows 🪟, area/perf 🏎️
  • Allow string property binding as Color source #9814
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>
  • Update WebAuthenticator to support custom ResponseDecoder (#11641) #11710
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [net7.0] Bump Microsoft.Bcl.AsyncInterfaces from 6.0.0 to 7.0.0 #11799
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net7.0] Clean up the files in the xml-docs artifacts #11792
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #11775
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Bug at DataTable.Load(dataReader) when result have NULL value on joined column #29744
  • Ef Core causes 'Access violation' when deleting Data that is tracked by ef core with ExecuteDeleteAsync #29743
  • EFCore 7.0.0 - Graph of entity insertion throws a FK exception #29741
  • DbContext.ChangeTracker.Entries() throws StackOverflowException #29740
  • NullReference Exception when Add-Migration when I try to use Json Column in EF7 #29738
  • Erroneous circular dependency detection when updating entities with composite primary key and one-to-one relationships #29737
  • Expression query not computed anymore from .NET Core 3.1 to .NET Core 6 #29736
  • Does Json Column support a collection value? #29735
  • Query/JSON: consider improvements to SQL we generate when we access element in collection mapped to JSON #29734
    Backlog
  • QueryTrackingBehavior resets to TrackAll when using DbContext pooling #29733
  • Query/JSON: improve exceptions when failing to translate JSON queries #29732

Closed

  • [7.0, SQL Server]: No option to override auto-generated Index filter for nullable columns #29739

PullRequests

Updated

  • Sequence cache support #29716
  • Bump Mono.TextTemplating from 2.2.1 to 2.3.1 #29462
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Fix to #28648 - Json/Query: translate element access of a json array #29656
  • Thanksgiving project: lookup entities by primary key, alternate key, or foreign key #29686

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Running tests without SDK? #15083

Closed

  • [release/7.0.1xx] Source-build-externals build failure #14491

PullRequests

Created

  • Update the implicit versions to match the December release #15084

Merged

  • Add instructions to build using Docker into VMR's README #15073
    Area-SourceBuild
